FEBRUARY 
2025
Health E-Stat 100: Maternal Mortality Rates in the 
United States, 2023
by Donna L. Hoyert, Ph.D.
This report presents maternal mortality rates for 2023 based on data from the National Vital 
Statistics System. A maternal death is defined by the World Health Organization as â€œthe death 
of a woman while pregnant or within 42 days of termination of pregnancy, irrespective of the 
duration and the site of the pregnancy, from any cause related to or aggravated by the pregnancy 
or its
